title: SUPER Powered USB Adapter? #shorts #iphone #linux
description: You can buy the O.MG adapter here (affiliate link):   #wifi #iphone #linux
transcript: This may look like a USB adapter but it actually has super powers. This is an O.MG adapter it has a built-in key logger that can capture your keystrokes it can also act like a keyboard to send high speed commands to a laptop or a phone. In this example I've got an Ubuntu laptop I'll plug the O.MG adapter in, notice I can move the mouse now using my external mouse. This also has a built-in Wi-Fi access point so on my iPhone I can connect to the O.MG adapter and then open up a web browser to a web server running within the O.MG adapter load a script that can send commands to the laptop and notice what's going to happen I'm not going to touch the laptop I'm simply going to press build and run notice I've been able to log in automatically to the Ubuntu laptop I'm now running commands on the laptop [Music] and notice I've been able to rickroll you by getting the laptop to open up Firefox and navigate to YouTube because
